author: bago
msg: Make sure the MessageWriter for the DOM does not introduce a preamble when it's been built from a message with no preamble. Multipart preamble and epilogue are now nullable so to be able to distinguish between empty preamble/epilogue and no preamble/epilogue (MIME4J-176)
